metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1345 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The bmexec_trans function in kwset.c in grep 2.19 through 2.21 allows localusers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read and crash) viacrafted input when using the -F option.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1345` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

grep - 2.24-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: grep package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.24-1').
